prompt: Design a user settings page with a dark theme and a matte black background (#212121). Feature a profile section at the top with a circular avatar (80x80 pixels) on the right, user name 'Jane Smith', and email 'jane.smith@email.com' in a card with a subtle amber border. Organize settings in a single-column layout with three sections: Account ('Edit Profile', 'Change Password', 'Privacy'), Preferences ('Notifications' toggle, 'Dark Mode' toggle, 'Language' with a dropdown arrow), and Support ('Help', 'Contact', 'About'). Use list tiles with amber icons (#FFB300) and white text. Place a full-width amber 'Logout' button at the bottom with rounded corners (8px). Apply 12px padding and 8px spacing, using Material 3 design with a modern, sleek aesthetic.
